sentence.Network_en: She made a fanning motion, pretending to cool herself off.
sentence.Network_cn: 她做了个扇风的动作，假装想让自己凉快一点。

sentence.Network_en: She buried her head under the covers, pretending to be asleep.
sentence.Network_cn: 她把头埋到被子底下，假装睡着了。

sentence.Network_en: He stared sullenly into space, pretending not to hear the jeers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他面色阴郁地凝视前方，假装没听见那些冷嘲热讽。

PerfectNetExp.abs: pretending: v. 假装;伪装(pretend的现在分词) adj. 伪称的;娇饰的 First he stops the production in the cloud while pretending to be on scheduled.
图文 adj. 伪称的;娇饰的  Then I kept pretending not to hear. 然而我却持续佯装听不见。 Or you are pretending ignorance of it? 还是你们都“假装”不知道.
so , Alex , are you still pretending to be archaeologist ?所以亚力士，你还在伪装考古学家吗？

if we really mean to lead , and to bring about a world more or less congenial to us , we should stop pretending that we can do job on the cheap remote control .如果我们〔美国)真有意领导世界，并使世界变得多少令人顺眼一些，那就不要再欺骗自己说这件工作不必花大钱，远远地发号施令就可以做到。

pretend you never went to school ., 假装你没上过学.

而假装游戏（Pretend Play）是其中一个最核心也是争论最多的一个话题， 以往对假装游戏的研究表明假装游戏在儿童的认知方面、 …

entry.def: If you pretend that something is the case, you act in a way that is intended to make people believe that it is the case, although in fact it is not.

example.ex: I pretend that things are really okay when they're not...
example.tran: 当情况不好的时候我假装一切顺利。

example.ex: Sometimes the boy pretended to be asleep...
example.tran: 有时这个男孩会假装睡着了。

entry.def: If children or adults pretend that they are doing something, they imagine that they are doing it, for example as part of a game.

example.ex: She can sunbathe and pretend she's in Spain...
example.tran: 她可以晒晒太阳，假装自己是在西班牙。

example.ex: The children pretend to be different animals dancing to the music.
example.tran: 孩子们扮成不同的动物，随着音乐起舞。

entry.def: If you do not pretend that something is the case, you do not claim that it is the case.

example.ex: We do not pretend that the past six years have been without problems for us...
example.tran: 我们并不自夸在过去的6年中没有遇到任何问题。

example.ex: Within this lecture I cannot pretend to deal adequately with dreams.
example.tran: 在这一次讲座中，我不敢自诩能对梦境作透彻的分析。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of giving a false appearance;

auth_sentence.content: So stop pretending that it's OK to cheat.
auth_sentence.res_content: So stop pretending that it's OK to cheat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So stop pretending that it's OK to cheat.

auth_sentence.content: We have acted accordingly by pretending to be duped.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have acted accordingly by pretending to be duped.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have acted accordingly by pretending to be duped.

auth_sentence.content: But I won't go on pretending to myself.
auth_sentence.res_content: But I won't go on pretending to myself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But I won't go on pretending to myself.
